    • Method Detail

      • setParentLayout

        public void setParentLayout(OoyalaPlayerLayout layout)
        Description copied from interface: OoyalaPlayerControls
        Set the parent layout that these controls should show on top of. This method should add the controls to this layout in the correct positions (but they should not actually be visible)
        Specified by:
        setParentLayout in interface OoyalaPlayerControls
        Parameters:
        layout - the layout that these controls should show on top of

        Parameters:

      • bottomBarOffset

        public int bottomBarOffset()
        Specified by:
        bottomBarOffset in interface OoyalaPlayerControls
        Returns:
        absolute pixel of the bottom bar's top distance to the bottom of the device. used by ClosedCaption to determine offset to the bottom.

      • topBarOffset

        public int topBarOffset()
        Specified by:
        topBarOffset in interface OoyalaPlayerControls
        Returns:
        Absolute pixel of the top bar's distance from the top of the device. Used by Learn More button to determine offset from top.
